projects.title: Revenue Insights In Hospitality Domain
projects.description: A Power BI Hospitality Revenue Analytics Dashboard analyzing RevPAR, ADR, and occupancy rates to optimize revenue strategies.

projects.title: Loan Approval Prediction Model
projects.description: A machine learning-based Loan Approval Prediction System with Flask, MySQL, and Scikit-learn, achieving 97.4% accuracy.

projects.title: Employee Turnover Analytics
projects.description: EDA and visualization of employee turnover drivers, including satisfaction levels, evaluation scores, and workload, using clustering and predictive modeling.

projects.title: Collaborative Code Editor Platform
projects.description: A real-time collaborative code editor using React, Node.js, and Socket.IO, enabling multi-user live coding and AI-assisted development.

projects.title: Depression Prediction Model
projects.description: Designed a 94%-accurate predictive model to classify depression and analyze key factors influencing mental health.

projects.title: Scatch
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce website. It demonstrates various backend functionalities including user authentication, shopping cart management, and data associations.

projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive employee management system with features for employee management, work allocation, and performance tracking.

projects.title: Customer Churn Analytics
projects.description: Data analytics project, Performed Exploratory Data Analysis and implemented a predictive model to analyze key drivers of churn.
